- Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel (2014) ) 
Plot Summary: A man named Mr. Shambhl, who runs the titular Grand Budapest Hotel, is approached by the concierge, Monsieur Joubert, who is interested in purchasing the hotel. In exchange for the purchase of the hotel, Joubert agrees to take over ownership of the hotel from Shambhl. However, before he can complete his purchase and assume control of the hotel, Joubert is found dead in his office at the Grand Budapest Hotel. The cause of death was determined to be from an asphyxial cause, specifically from a ligature around the neck. The following individuals were named as suspects by the police investigation into Joubert's murder: - Title: The Hangover  (2012) ) 
Plot Summary: Three friends on a bachelor party in Las Vegas have no memory of anything after their friend Dan invites them all to dinner at his brother-in-law's house, which happens to be right next door to the casino. When they arrive at Dan's house, they find that Dan is nowhere to be found. They begin to panic and realize that something strange has happened to their friend Dan.
